name: Martin Ray
description:
I am very a simple man by nature and I enjoy the happiness of others. I live my life to be useful to people around me. I have equal respect for everybody .I came in this site to end loneliness in my heart and I hope to meet the lucky woman whom I can submit my heart to.
I can say that am too generous to a fault due to my kind heart. I respect women a lot because it is in my nature to respect and protect especially the one I love. I found this site interesting because it is an opportunity for me to find a soul mate that I can love and cherish with my sincere heart. I wish to meet the lucky woman whom I shall submit my heart to.
